text:
In celebration of The Lion King's digital re-release on Aug. 15 and Blu-ray release on Aug. 29, check out never-before-seen footage of Rowan Atkinson, Jason Weaver and Laura Williams recording "I Just Can't Wait to Be King" for the film's soundtrack.

The exclusive bonus clip also offers a glimpse of Nathan Lane, Ernie Sabella and Jonathan Taylor Thomas recording bits of dialogue as Pumba, Timon and Simba, respectively.

Click here if the video player does not display.
